title: What can I do if I can't access the Internet after my data service is turned on?
answer:
l   Make sure your SIM card is properly inserted. For details, see the Quick Start Guide that comes with your phone.

l   Make sure your phone supports the SIM card mode. For details, contact your SIM card vendor.

l   Make sure you have subscribed to a data plan for your SIM card. For details, contact your service provider.

l   Make sure your SIM card has sufficient balance. Your service provider may stop providing Internet access to SIM cards that have a negative balance.

l   Restore the APN settings to their default values.

Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **More** > **Mobile networks** > **Access Point Names** > **Reset to default**, and then try again.
